verses.verse: Paul, <S%G3972><s%> an apostle <S%G652><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> by the will <S%G2307><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> to the saints <S%G40><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> are at <S%G1722><s%> Ephesus, <S%G2181><s%> and to the faithful <S%G4103><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus: <S%G2424><s%>
Grace <S%G5485><s%> be to you, and peace, <S%G1515><s%> from God <S%G2316><s%> our Father, <S%G3962><s%> and from the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

Blessed <S%G2128><s%> be the God <S%G2316><s%> and Father <S%G3962><s%> of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> has blessed <S%G2127><s%> us with all <S%G3956><s%> spiritual <S%G4152><s%> blessings <S%G2129><s%> in heavenly <S%G2032><s%> places in Christ: <S%G5547><s%>

According <S%G2531><s%> as he has chosen <S%G1586><s%> us in him before <S%G4253><s%> the foundation <S%G2602><s%> of the world, <S%G2889><s%> that we should be holy <S%G40><s%> and without <S%G299><s%> blame <S%G299><s%> before <S%G2714><s%> him in love: <S%G26><s%>

Having predestinated <S%G4309><s%> us to the adoption <S%G5206><s%> of children <S%G5206><s%> by Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> to himself, <S%G848><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the good pleasure <S%G2107><s%> of his will, <S%G2307><s%>
To the praise <S%G1868><s%> of the glory <S%G1391><s%> of his grace, <S%G5485><s%> wherein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3757><s%> he has made <S%G5487><s%> us accepted <S%G5487><s%> in the beloved. <S%G25><s%>

In whom <S%G3739><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> redemption <S%G629><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> his blood, <S%G129><s%> the forgiveness <S%G859><s%> of sins, <S%G3900><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the riches <S%G4149><s%> of his grace; <S%G5485><s%>
Wherein <S%G3757><s%> he has abounded <S%G4052><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> us in all <S%G3956><s%> wisdom <S%G4678><s%> and prudence; <S%G5428><s%>

Having made <S%G1107><s%> known <S%G1107><s%> to us the mystery <S%G3466><s%> of his will, <S%G2307><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to his good pleasure <S%G2107><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he has purposed <S%G4388><s%> in himself: <S%G848><s%>

That in the dispensation <S%G3622><s%> of the fullness <S%G4138><s%> of times <S%G2540><s%> he might gather <S%G346><s%> together <S%G346><s%> in one all <S%G3956><s%> things in Christ, <S%G5547><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> are in heaven, <S%G3772><s%> and which <S%G3588><s%> are on <S%G1909><s%> earth; <S%G1093><s%> even in him:

In whom <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> obtained <S%G2820><s%> an inheritance, <S%G2820><s%> being predestinated <S%G4309><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the purpose <S%G4286><s%> of him who works <S%G1754><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things after <S%G2596><s%> the counsel <S%G1012><s%> of his own <S%G848><s%> will: <S%G2307><s%>
That we should be to the praise <S%G1868><s%> of his glory, <S%G1391><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> first <S%G4276><s%> trusted <S%G4276><s%> in Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

In whom <S%G3739><s%> you also <S%G2532><s%> trusted, after that you heard <S%G191><s%> the word <S%G4487><s%> of truth, <S%G225><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> salvation: <S%G4991><s%> in whom <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> after that you believed, <S%G4100><s%> you were sealed <S%G4972><s%> with that holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of promise, <S%G1860><s%>

Which <S%G3739><s%> is the earnest <S%G728><s%> of our inheritance <S%G2817><s%> until <S%G1519><s%> the redemption <S%G629><s%> of the purchased <S%G4047><s%> possession, <S%G4047><s%> to the praise <S%G1868><s%> of his glory. <S%G1391><s%>

Why <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> I also, <S%G2504><s%> after I heard <S%G191><s%> of your <S%G5209><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> in the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and love <S%G26><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> the saints, <S%G40><s%>
Cease <S%G3973><s%> not to give thanks <S%G2168><s%> for you, making <S%G4160><s%> mention <S%G3417><s%> of you in my prayers; <S%G4335><s%>

That the God <S%G2316><s%> of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> of glory, <S%G1391><s%> may give <S%G1325><s%> to you the spirit <S%G4151><s%> of wisdom <S%G4678><s%> and revelation <S%G602><s%> in the knowledge <S%G1922><s%> of him:

The eyes <S%G3788><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> understanding <S%G1271><s%> being enlightened; <S%G5461><s%> that you may know <S%G1492><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> is the hope <S%G1680><s%> of his calling, <S%G2821><s%> and what <S%G5101><s%> the riches <S%G4149><s%> of the glory <S%G1391><s%> of his inheritance <S%G2817><s%> in the saints, <S%G40><s%>

And what <S%G5101><s%> is the exceeding <S%G5235><s%> greatness <S%G3174><s%> of his power <S%G1411><s%> to us-ward <S%G1519><s%> <S%G5209><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> believe, <S%G4100><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the working <S%G1753><s%> of his mighty <S%G2479><s%> power, <S%G2904><s%>

Which <S%G3739><s%> he worked <S%G1754><s%> in Christ, <S%G5547><s%> when he raised <S%G1453><s%> him from the dead, <S%G3498><s%> and set <S%G2523><s%> him at <S%G1722><s%> his own <S%G848><s%> right <S%G1188><s%> hand in the heavenly <S%G2032><s%> places,

Far <S%G5231><s%> above <S%G5231><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> principality, <S%G746><s%> and power, <S%G1849><s%> and might, <S%G1411><s%> and dominion, <S%G2963><s%> and every <S%G3956><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> that is named, <S%G3687><s%> not only <S%G3440><s%> in this <S%G3588><s%> world, <S%G165><s%> but also <S%G2532><s%> in that which is to come: <S%G3195><s%>

And has put <S%G5293><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things under <S%G5259><s%> his feet, <S%G4228><s%> and gave <S%G1325><s%> him to be the head <S%G2776><s%> over <S%G5228><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things to the church, <S%G1577><s%>
Which <S%G3748><s%> is his body, <S%G4983><s%> the fullness <S%G4138><s%> of him that fills <S%G4137><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> in all. <S%G3956><s%>
